cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Air mass factor for the cloud-free part of the scene

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Air mass factor for the cloud-covered part of the scene

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: DOAS polynomial coefficients from x0 to x4

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Root mean square residual of the fit

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: a-priori mass mixing ratio profile of water vapor

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Precision of the slant column of water vapor

cd:Attribute.name: flag_meanings
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: no_error solar_eclipse sun_glint_possible descending night geo_boundary_crossing geolocation_error

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: cloud albedo from the CRB model

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Albedo of cloud using the OCRA/ROCINN CRB model

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: effective radiometric cloud fraction from the CRB model

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Retrieved effective radiometric cloud fraction using the OCRA/ROCINN CRB model

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: cloud radiometric optical centroid pressure from the CRB model

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Retrieved atmospheric pressure at the level of cloud using the OCRA/ROCINN CRB model

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: pressure constant parameter A for lower bound of the layer

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: pressure constant parameter A for upper bound of the layer

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: pressure constant parameter B for lower bound of the layer

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: pressure constant parameter B for upper bound of the layer

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: flag indicating snow/ice at center of ground pixel

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: offset of start time of measurement relative to time reference

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This coordinate variable defines the indices across track, from west to east; index starts at 0

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: A continuous quality descriptor, varying between 0 (no data) and 1 (full quality data). Recommend to ignore data with qa_value < 0.75

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This coordinate variable defines the indices along track; index starts at 0

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: The time in this variable corresponds to the time in the time_reference global attribute

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Total vertical column of water vapor

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Precision of the total vertical column of water vapor
